propertyDefinition.label: Host Name
propertyDefinition.description: The name of the machine where the Mongo database is located

propertyDefinition.label: Port
propertyDefinition.description: The port where the Mongo database is listening for connections.

propertyDefinition.label: Database Name
propertyDefinition.description: The name of the database where you want to store the data

propertyDefinition.label: Authentication User Name
propertyDefinition.description: If authentication is required to write to this database, enter the user name here.

propertyDefinition.label: Authentication Password
propertyDefinition.description: If authentication is required to write to this database, enter the password here.

propertyDefinition.label: Collection Name
propertyDefinition.description: The name of the collection where the data will be written

propertyDefinition.label: Write Concern
propertyDefinition.description: The method that is used to write data to the Mongo Database. For details, consult the Mongo DB Documentation on different write concern modes. Errors encountered will be logged, but will not stop the processing of future GeoEvents.
